name: Zero To Hero (Zerobreaker)
description:
A simple game where you fight enemies collect materials and level up.

Movement: Arrow Keys

Shoot: Auto attacks enemies in range (attack speed is important) 

Display : O to hide/show

exit: end key

sound control: None as no sound yet

window: can be maximized or alt+enter for full screen

the starting place is where you have to be to build, upgrade or boost stats.

enemies level up too.

Note: currently has no save/load

has 2 map sizes.
